properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM QUESTION WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT Q.QUESTION_NO, Q.QUESTION_TITLE,M.USER_ID,Q.CONTENT, Q.MODIFY_DATE FROM QUESTION Q JOIN MEMBER M ON (Q.QUESTION_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Q.QUESTION_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE QUESTION SET QUESTION_TITLE=?,CONTENT=? WHERE QUESTION_NO=? AND STATUS= 'Y'
SELECT Q.QUESTION_NO,Q.QUESTION_TITLE,M.USER_ID,Q.CONTENT,Q.MODIFY_DATE FROM QUESTION Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(QUESTION_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE QUESTION_NO = ? AND Q.STATUS='Y'
UPDATE QUESTION SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE QUESTION_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
